TopicTitle: Titan II carrying my own Gemini Mission.

Articles.Content: This is a REALLY fun rocket to fly!! Thanks to Tosh for the Gemini Mod and NovaPunch for the NovaPunch parts pack.
Very cool! I\'ve been thinking about making one the same way, but haven\'t gotten \'round to it.
This is my Titan and Gemini Capsule in orbit just after separation.

and NovaPunch for the NovaPunch parts pack.

???

Also, did that work without config edits?

???

Also, did that work without config edits?

Yeah, surprisingly it did! The twin bertha was able to launch my rocket into orbit. After having some trouble maintaining a stable apogee after launch, I did mod the engine -- but only slightly -- to give it about an extra 50 of thrust and about 3/4 the burn rate.

I like the NovaPunch parts, but to be honest, I\'m unimpressed with how much they wobble. They seem very unstable at times. Just constructive criticism. Hopefully Nova won\'t take offense to my observations.

Pretty sure he won\'t care

(hint: NovaSilisko doesn\'t maintain NovaPunch, I do)

Anyway, its a known problem, and related to the engine the game runs on, where higher mass physics parts can interact badly with others.

The big tanks are already way lighter than they should be, but even their current weight makes the connections between parts act weird. I could make their silly-light, but they wouldn\'t be balanced and they wouldn\'t be usable with anything else.

I actually don\'t have trouble with it too much anymore, maybe I subconsciously build in a way to avoid it. If you wanna post craft files or screens of rockets with severe wobble, I can try to tighten it up.
Logged back in to post this video here.
I thought the Titan II-GLV was a two stage vehicle...

I thought the Titan II-GLV was a two stage vehicle...

which one? mine?

I thought the Titan II-GLV was a two stage vehicle...

It is...

But this isn\'t the titan II-GLV

Its an imposter.

In all honesty, I designed a rocket before the gemini mod was even started (Tosh did extremely well with it). It was designed for a 1.75m tank because of that (and the fact that I though Silisko Edition had them too). All that was different was that there was a decoupler, stock engine and one of the bigger tanks above the stage you have there.

Overal though, good job.

Logged back in to post this video here.

I like it! I\'m updating my rocket to be two stage (I didn\'t know the Titan II had two stages and then a Gemini Capsule).

Good work.

I like it! I\'m updating my rocket to be two stage (I didn\'t know the Titan II had two stages and then a Gemini Capsule).

Good work.

Was yours an SSTO?

Was yours an SSTO?

It was. And then the Gemini would separate from the rocket once the entire craft made orbit. I updated it to be two stages before the capsule, though.
